
[1] Unpack the files here:

~/git/IOC/FieldOpt-Research/FieldOpt/ThirdParty/snopt/src

[2] Enter the src/snopt-7.2.12.2 dir and compile the lib:

$cd ~/git/IOC/FieldOpt-Research/FieldOpt/ThirdParty/snopt/src/snopt-7.2.12.2
$./compile

[3] Copy snopt *so lib to Thirdpary libraries dir

$cd ../../lib
$cp libsnopt-7.2.12.2.so ../../libraries/lib/
